result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey C. Thomas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Identity Theft-Financial Gain [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
**NO CREDIT IF REVOKED**

If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: 20CF1183, 20CF1330.

miscConds.notes: Restitution TBD in 22CM335 and 22CF319 and to include 5% and 10% restitution surcharges.
AODA and follow through with recommendations.

Maintain absolute sobriety. 
Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.

No contact with M.F.
No contact with any known drug dealers/users except in a therapeutic setting.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey C. Thomas

records.addlTxt:
Cases called at 8:45 AM: 20CF1183, 20CF1330, 21CF824, 21CF1067, 22CF819, 22CM335.
Defendant Jeffrey C. Thomas in court with Attorney David W. Field.  Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
22CF819: Defendant waives reading of Complaint and Time Limits for Preliminary Hearing. $2,000 Signature Bond Set.
Defendant indicates that he would like to accept the plea offer today. Defendant waives his right to Preliminary Hearing in 22CF819. Defendant waives receipt of Information. 
State to file Information within 48 Hours. Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
20CF1183: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1 as charged.
20CF1330: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1 as charged.
22CF819: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1 as charged. 
Repeaters and 2nd and Subsequent acknowledged.
Sentence is Withheld and the Defendant is placed on 3 Years of Probation with the following conditions:
120 Days of Jail with Huber stayed pending further order of the Court (20CF1330). Maintain absolute sobriety. No contact with M.F.
No contact with any known drug dealers/users except in a therapeutic setting. Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.  Court Costs surcharges including one warrant fee. Restitution in the amount of $116.68 plus the 10% surcharge (21CF824).
Restitution TBD within 60 days in cases 22CM335 and 22CF819.
Defendant to pay a minimum of $20 per month towards the restitution.
Remaining charges are dismissed and read in.  
Defendant is granted 5 days of credit in 20CF1183 and 2 days of credit in 20CF1330.
Initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Cases called at 10:15 AM: 20CF1183, 20CF1330, 21CF824, 21CF1067, 22CF819, 22CM335.
Defendant Jeffrey C. Thomas not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Jeffrey C. Thomas.  Deputy District Attorney Angela Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Field has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. 
STC: 10/13/22 at 8:45 AM.

Cases called at 9:38 AM: 20CF1183, 20CF1330, 22CF819, 21CF824, 21CF1067, 22CM335.
Defendant Jeffrey C. Thomas not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Jeffrey C. Thomas.  Attorney Angela Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Field has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. 
STC/Initial Appearance: 8/19/22 at 10:05 AM.
Status conference on August 19, 2022 at 10:05 am.
